reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly and is always available for extra help. Highly recommend her class!

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures and engaging discussions, but the exams can be tough if you're not prepared.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult to follow during lectures, and the lab assignments are overwhelming. Not recommended for beginners.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Provides good insights, but the lectures can be a bit monotonous. Requires a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis makes economics interesting and relevant. Her examples are very relatable.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: His teaching style is confusing, and he rarely answers emails. The exams are too difficult.

reviews.subject: Sociology of Media
reviews.review: Fascinating course material and engaging professor. She encourages a lot of class participation.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The lectures are clear, but the problem sets are challenging. You need to stay on top of the material.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is passionate about philosophy and always encourages deep thinking. The reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Computer Science I
reviews.review: Great introductory course. Prof. Taylor is very approachable and makes programming fun.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but sometimes the lectures lack structure. Field trips are a plus.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is knowledgeable and loves literature. The essays are graded strictly.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: The material is dense and not well-organized. Labs are long and not very informative.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Amazing professor! His passion for art history is contagious. Lectures are captivating.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Practical and insightful course. Dr. Robinson uses real-world examples that are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Good course, but sometimes it feels like the discussions go off-topic. Needs more structure.

reviews.subject: Anatomy and Physiology
reviews.review: Dr. Hill is an excellent instructor. She makes complex topics understandable and is very supportive.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Encourages creativity and gives constructive feedback. Workshops are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Data Science
reviews.review: One of the best courses Iâ€™ve taken. Dr. Allen is extremely knowledgeable and helps students grasp tough concepts.

reviews.subject: Econometrics
reviews.review: Difficult course with lots of math. Prof. Harris is knowledgeable but not the best at explaining.
